title: Majestic-milf
author: Majestic-milf
content: I wouldn't want to make this look like a trend or maybe seem like I'm fishing for merits; but I think it's necessary to express gratitude and give honor to whom it's due.Â My journey on this platform started out as some; a curious newbie who wanted to satisfy not only curiosity, but also some deep placed belief that places like this cannot truely exist without having an iota of scam or illegitimacy.. Oh, how wrong I was!!ðŸ¤¦ðŸ¤¦ðŸ¤¦Â With consistency and devotion (and a truckload of pushing, if I may add), I've been able to come this far. Many exceptional individuals on here also so played a key role in my growth and it would be an act of ingratitude if I don't mention a few of them.The Chymist; always backing me up with not only merits, but constructive criticism as well.Philipma 1957;Â  I should say a lot, probably a eulogy of sorts, but I'd just be brief. Thank you for your unrelenting support.Cryptoprenuerbrainboss, Pooya, Welsh and all those who helped in one way or another to push me to this pinnacle.Â Learning, they say, never stops and I hope to keep learning till I get there. For now, I drop my pen here...To the real MVPs of this forum, I say my thanks.

comments.author: krishnaverma
comments.body: Congrats on theÂ  awesome journey so far and good luck for future.

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Quote from: Majestic-milf on November 26, 2022, 02:08:58 PM I wouldn't want to make this look like a trend or maybe seem like I'm fishing for merits; Excusatio non petita, accusatio manifesta.Please lock this thread and post your achievement here:Announce your rank up, merit or any achievements that makes you feel great!You may even get some merits there, despite not wanting to.
